data.title: Joss Whedon
data.text:
batfleck

Ben Affleck Says Playing Batman in Justice League “Broke My Heart”

“That was the worst experience I’ve ever seen in a business which is full of some shitty experiences.”

dollars and sense

Batgirl Is Dead at Warner Bros. Because of Its $90 Million Price Tag

The nearly completed superhero film starring Leslie Grace was reportedly too pricey for HBO Max, but not expensive enough for theatrical release.

Joss Whedon

Joss Whedon Denies Accusations by Ray Fisher and Gal Gadot

“I don’t threaten people. Who does that?” the writer-director said in a bombshell interview.

Ben Affleck

“The Person Who Does This Should Love It”: Ben Affleck on His Complicated Relationship With Batman

The A-lister reflects on his time as the Caped Crusader in a recent Los Angeles Times interview.

toxic tales

Gal Gadot Says Joss Whedon “Threatened” Her Career on the Set of Justice League

The filmmaker also said “he would make my career miserable,” the Wonder Woman star alleged in a recent interview.

review

Joss Whedon’s Steampunk Fantasy Series, The Nevers, Is Pretty Nonsense

It’s a lot like X-Men, but with bustles, and also magic?

From the Magazine

Justice League: The Shocking, Exhilarating, Heartbreaking True Story of #TheSnyderCut

A demoralizing battle with Warner Bros. A devastating personal tragedy. A fan base he couldn’t control. Zack Snyder tells V.F. why he quit Justice League, and why he’s returned to complete a cut that’s reached near-mythical status.

Developing

Buffy Alum Eliza Dushku Supports Charisma Carpenter After Joss Whedon Allegations

Yet another star from the Joss Whedon universe is joining the list of actors speaking out against their former boss.

Bad Feminists

Buffy the Vampire Slayer Star Charisma Carpenter Speaks Out About Joss Whedon

Carpenter is the latest actor to describe her working environment under Whedon as “toxic.”

Feuds

Ray Fisher v Warner Bros.: The Battle That Short-Circuited Cyborg

The Justice League actor says speaking out cost him a role in The Flash film. Meanwhile, the studio has defended its investigation and executives.

Once More With Feeling

The Buffy Cast Agrees With Stacey Abrams: Buffy Belonged With Spike

The Democratic party star posted her thoughts on one of Buffy the Vampire Slayer’s most debated relationships—and everyone from Sarah Michelle Gellar to creator Joss Whedon weighed in on her controversial take.

Look, Up in the Sky!

The Snyder Cut of Justice League Is Coming to HBO Max in 2021

The long-rumored alternate version of the failed blockbuster will debut next year.

Reboots

Buffy Is Being Rebooted with a Black Slayer

Joss Whedon will executive produce the new series announced at Comic-Con.

on the carpet

Joss Whedon Defends His Controversial Wonder Woman Script: “I Think It’s Great”

At the Avengers: Infinity War red carpet, the director also elaborated on his “heartbreaking” departure from the Batgirl movie.

holy toledo

Joss Whedon Sheepishly Exits Batgirl: “Is There a Sexier Word for ‘Failed?’”

Could his departure leave room for a female filmmaker to take the reins?

Not-So-United

Justice League Is A Major Box Office Disappointment

$96 million is not a great start for Warner Bros.’ fall superhero tentpole.
